str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

str2: (a) I reprove, rebuke, discipline, (b) I expose, show to be guilty. Of uncertain affinity; to confute, admonish.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.

str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
